website_summaries.verdict: Great for installation in multiple housing units. Professional installation recommended, but not required. Compatible with most smart systems, including Echo.
pros: The thermostat learns homeowner's preferred settings over time
cons: Professional installation required to extend warranty
Better for homes than commercial buildings

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a WiFi enabled thermostat. Our house is approximately 25 years old and had Honey well trol a temp dials. Unfortunately, 3 hours with customer service couldn’t figure out there was no C wire. Nest is a power stealing thermostat and needs at least 24v to work properly. When Nest said it might be a bad unit, they only shipped me a new connector plate. Disappointed with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it is smart too.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thermostat I could program which would not require a degree to figure out. This one you hook it up, and let it figure you out. I also received a rebate of $75 from my power company for it. Some companies will help you with it all the way. get the app for your phone and it knows where you are and when to heat up the house and when you aren't home. this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Horton

customer_reviews.title: 21st century thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent thermostat that I can control from anywhere with my smartphone, which is especially important for me since I have mobility limitations. It's hard for me to get up and down the stairs. My bedroom is upstairs and the thermostat is downstairs. Now I don't have to make the trip to change the temperature. I can also turn the air conditioning/furnace off during the day when I'm at work and turn it on again when I start the drive back home. My one concern is that, since it's connected to my WiFi network, it might be an access point for hackers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed unit sold as new!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t give any stars, but it requires you select one... Received package. No plastic sealing Nest box, seal was broken, and no protective plastic on face of Nest unit. I know they come sealed and protected, because I own another one. Not cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Was a really good decision
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good decision. I bought a used unit on the amazon site. It came in looking brand new. No dents, scratches in its original box with all the documentation. The thermostat is app always me to change the temperature settings on my phone. No longer had to get out of bed in the middle of the night. The metrics help me make better decisions about heating/cooling the house. It almost works like a magical device, after about a week, the thermostat would automatically change the temperature settings inside the house to match my preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo H

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to install because it comes with no basic menu navigation instructions. I spent .5 hours trying to figure out how to enter a capital letter to connect to my network. The software is limiting and not intuitive. You also need to use a magnifying glass to read a couple items. I think the software is the major flaw. Once I logged in using my google account I could not revert to a separate password. Basically when you use your google account it has access to all your information. Customer support is limited to online chat. I see no benefit to purchasing this device compared to much less expensive alternatives. Access with Alexa and remote access is beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leja

customer_reviews.title: The best smart thermostat
customer_reviews.text: We're invested in Alexa universe so we wanted a smart thermostat to manage our household HVAC. Ecobee is less expensive and has many featured, but I really enjoyed the elegant interface of a modern thermostat with an old-school ring control (in addition to the smart features). Installation was very straightforward. The materials they provided were first rate. The thermostat has worked flawlessly since installation. The Nest app works well and integration into Alexa was easy. We now can voice control the thermostat from anywhere in the house. An excellent purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Decker

customer_reviews.title: Black screened and dead in less than three (3) months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two (2) stats at the same time. One works fine, one died at less than three months. Customer service is almost nonexistent. Phone support is canceled and you have the choices of the "community" support where other uses send you "answers", or chatting with some sort of "bot" on Facebook. MId-summer, with a dead stat and no support. I couldn't recommend this, with a clear conscience, to anyone. Looking on the "community" site, nd I'm not alone in either the problem or treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Don't Know Why I Waited So Long- Oh Yeah, My Husband
customer_reviews.text: Could not imagine living without this thing now. Control it with all my Alexa's or my phone. Our house is in full sun literally all day long so this really helps keeping a constant temperature with that issue. I used to have to walk (Ugh. I know, right?) to the old thermostat and change it multiple times a day just to try and keep up with the sun. This is definitely a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't love this at all.
customer_reviews.text: We don't repeat our schedule enough for this to work well. Seems like it is always trying to guess where I want the heat and that is not what I want - heat was on 72 the other day...we never put it that high. I haven't figured out the app enough to be able to keep on the temp I want. I just want to set it and leave it. Wish we had bought the $25 unit at Walmart you can just program and hold the temp.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this every moment of every day, and sometimes I’m out and sometimes I’m home for it. I can set temps for different hours and see the weather. This is the one that works for Alexa, but one new in a box - never open box because people switch out the old backs. I set it up all by myself, called nest for troubleshooting in my own home. Would not recommend to people in severely cold climates, as i’ve heard about the cords not communicating. I live in Florida with my dog and I’m fine.
customer_reviews.author: FL_Girl

customer_reviews.title: The AI kind-of fights me
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is one awesome thermostat: it's a piece of art, feels good to operate, installs in minutes, etc. My minor grief is the AI. One day I turned the heat on early and it's been turning the heat on that time ever since -- even if I get up every day and turn it back down -- a few minutes later the AI cranks the heat back up. I'm going to setup a manual schedule. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: ElVaporizer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not without it's issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm having problems with this keeping the correct time-- yes, the time. Not the date, but the time-- it's off by about 30-45 minutes. I thought it was my router or network, but everything else on the network tells the correct time. Also, sometimes it does not know when I am home or away -- I mean know it correctly. The good-- nice display; easy to use, and helps me manage my energy consumption. I think those Eccobee's perform more reliably. Wish I had bought that.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy install and works with Google Home
customer_reviews.text: Really like our Nest. Easy to install and like being able to control it with our phones using the app. We also connected it to our Google Home which allows us to change the temp using voice commands.
customer_reviews.author: KJHawkeye1

customer_reviews.title: NESTing Nicely
customer_reviews.text: Great Thermostat. First couple of weeks while it learns can be a bit quirky, however once settled it performs nicely. The app is nicely laid out and makes managing the device straight forward. I use mine with a Heat Pump/Boiler configuration. What I like so far, in the winter if the Heat Pump is taking to long to heat the NEST will the Boiler to kick in and assist. Tech support is scripted so be prepared to perform those common steps when and if you call.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cacciatore

customer_reviews.title: HAL 9000
customer_reviews.text: I still have the issue where the thermostat has a mind of its own. It decided to set the house temperature to 50 degrees! I’ve double checked all of the settings, turned off WiFi, turned off all of the special features. Software is up to date. It is just weird! The thermostat is behaving now, so I added more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is there to help!
customer_reviews.text: I ran into trouble when I installed the Ness T3008, somehow I had installed the cables in a certain order that the heater was not working. I called customer service and provided a "before" picture when originally installed, that helps tremendously. Make sure to take a picture of the cable layout before de-install the old thermostat. I called the customer support center and the lady walked me through step until the device was installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Becker Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love the product - Pay attention to what “Pro” means
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Please note that the “Pro” series is meant to be installed by a pro... I was still able to do it, but keep that in mind. Perhaps use Google to understand that part further. Pairing to Alexa was a breeze. The app is intuitive. Very happy we spent a little more and went with the nest. Install note: House built in 2005. Had a white wire in old thermostat plugged into “E”. Instructions said to put that in the asterisk port. That wire was actually “W1” for heat control. That isn’t the fault of anyone, just a note in case you run into it.
customer_reviews.author: RCGMCC

customer_reviews.title: Saves you money- worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nest thermostat! We held off for a long time, but I’m so glad we went for it. Helpful to control temps away, especially traveling in winter and warming up house before getting home. I love the Eco mode to automatically save energy when you leave. Super easy to use, low profile. We had the easier wiring with only a few questions. My electrician in-law installed it- not sure if we would have otherwise with zero experience. Saving money already- highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Look's good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy app to use, but nothing happened. I tried everything but no cold air would blow out of the vents. The outside compressor was on, but nothing was happening. All the YouTube videos were helpful, but I'm so glad I took a picture of the wiring of the old thermostat and just reconnected it. Everything is now back to normal. Just note, this is a 50 / 50 shot based on the "C wire" and how old your heat pump / AC unit is. It's just not worth the ache and pains. And used to work at Amazon as a Manager.
customer_reviews.author: eric j. fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons. But great once it works
customer_reviews.text: Had no C wire on my AC unit. After wasting a few days trying to figure out why the AC didn’t run after I put it in I had to call customer service at Nest. Overall took a long time to get it to run and multiple phone calls. Nest eventually scheduled a technician to come out and run C wire at their cost. Super happy with the product now. But it did take a month from when I acquired it to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Good investment if it works
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Less than a year later and the wifi doesn’t work. This isn’t from voltage or interference but a hardware failure in the unit. No warranty Great product and easy install. I like the ability to ajust the temperature for anywhere, correcting others attempts to impact my bill is great
customer_reviews.author: keith a vickery

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really nice. Simple design reminiscent of the fruit company. Works really well. The only down side was it took a tad longer and more research to install than I would have liked but that was a little on me. I have a unit that took some research to find what wires went where. And my unit had a few more wires than most of the units described in the installation instructions.
customer_reviews.author: junglejim

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: How can an item be sold that is “not for retail sale”? We will be filing an A-Z complaint with Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

We had never looked up a YouTube video for it thinking since it was a pricey product the instructions would be clear. They’re not. You have to charge the thermostat for a few hours before installing. Then it doesn’t come with a mini usb charger so I had to scramble to look for one since we don’t have android products at home. The device is great once you get it to work. I just wish the instructions were a little more clear.
customer_reviews.author: NikiO

customer_reviews.title: Value exceeds

Only problem was it was missing parts in the box like the included screwdriver and metal back plate but really didn't need those because I have several screwdrivers
customer_reviews.author: Rog321

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!

The other one is still working in the bedroom, but it’s starting to show signs of issues. Expensive equipment for the lack of service and reliability I expected. Won’t buy again.

customer_reviews.title: pair with alexa to lay in bed and change your house temp.
customer_reviews.text: was very easy to install with the provided instructions , screws, and tools. my house only has central heat so this is only good to me in the winter - but I paired with my alexa so I can lay in bed and tell Alexa to turn the heat up or down. Will be adding central air soon and cannot wait to use this.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE IF YOU LOGIN TO GOOGLE HOME WITH A G-SUITE EMAIL ADDRESS!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, great setup. Crem de le crem, best of the best right? Yes! Except, they are not compatible with G-Suite email addresses. According to Google staff, there is no plan in the back-log to support G Suite users. Only buy these if you have a regular gmail.com account that you use with Google Home; if you plan to configure the thermostat as part of your smart home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shufro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install within minutes. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the options for customization as far as programming, setting schedules, and the different modes. I love being able to monitor and adjust the thermostat while away from home. The only thing I wish was different is the materiality/color of the backplate. Instead of a white plastic finish, it would have been nice to see a brushed stainless steel option as well for a bit of an upgraded look.

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Many furnaces do not follow standard color coding to your old thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: Warning! Many furnaces do not follow standard color coding to your old thermostat! 5 yr old house, replaced, thermostat, turned out AC wire was blue (get it?) not white!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: No change from older models

Easy on the eyes, but other smart thermostats offer similar features for much less cost. Remodeling my home and decided to upgrade from 2nd to 3rd generation. After my contractor installed, I could not tell the difference and decided to return this 3rd generation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nest is great, but not with iPhone X

Not so fast, the GPS component doesn't work as expected. The system did not work during the night switching my system to away status. This isn't good because the cool temperature is needed when someone is home. Not good.

customer_reviews.title: Works well

customer_reviews.title: The nest has a mind of its own

customer_reviews.title: Learning capabilities
